body_html: cc @martinwicke perhaps https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/e55574f28257bdacd744dcdba86c839e661b1b2a/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_sources.md should specify a bazel version? I've had similar issues before -- the latest version of bazel couldn't build any stable release on Mac (also couldn't build master either for a couple of days)
